class.name: b4j.map.openmaps
class.designerProperty: Key: BooleanExample, DisplayName: Show Seconds, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Verifica se l'oggetto sia stato inizializzato.

method.name: _vv1
method.comment: Adds a circle To the map. Center - Position of the circle center. Radius - Circle radius. StrokeWidth - Stroke width. StrokeColor - Stroke color. FillColor - Inner color. Opacity - Inner color opacity. Value between 0 To 1.

method.name: _vv2
method.comment: Opens an info window with the given HTML content at the specified position.

method.name: _vv3
method.comment: Opens an info window with the given HTML content at the specified position. It cannot be larger than MaxWidth (in pixels).

method.name: _vv4
method.comment: Adds a marker to the map.

method.name: _vv5
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon. The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", File.GetUri(File.DirAssets, "SomeIcon.png")) see https://kml4earth.appspot.com/icons.html for icons

method.name: _vv6
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon and label The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", File.GetUri(File.DirAssets, "SomeIcon.png"))

method.name: _vv7
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon. The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", File.GetUri(File.DirAssets, "SomeIcon.png",32,32)) see https://kml4earth.appspot.com/icons.html for icons

method.name: _vvv1
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon and label. The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", File.GetUri(File.DirAssets, "SomeIcon.png",32,32))

method.name: _vvv2
method.comment: Adds a polygon To the map. Points - A list Or Array of LatLng points. es. array(array(41.90, 12.49),array(41.80, 12.50),array(41.85, 12.60)) StrokeWidth - Stroke width. StrokeColor - Stroke color. FillColor - Inner color. Opacity - Inner color opacity. Value between 0 To 1.

method.name: _vvv3
method.comment: Adds a polyline To the map. Points - A list Or Array of LatLng points. Width - Line width. Color - Line color. CloseInfoWindow (InfoWindow As InfoWindow) Closes the specified info window.

method.name: _vvv7
method.comment: Returns the current camera position.

method.name: _designercreateview
method.comment: Base type must be Object

method.name: _vvvv6
method.comment: Offset -> Map difference; Tollerance -> Editing Poly point

method.name: _vvvvv1
method.comment: If an element is already in editing, it is not possible to edit another at the same time. Dim Success As Boolean = OpenMap.EditingPolygon(Polygon,True)

method.name: _vvvvv4
method.comment: Makes only the objects visible inside the visible map (Bounds)

method.name: _getvvvvvvvvvvv4
_getvvvvvvvvvvv5
method.comment: Number Of Elements added

method.name: _vvvvvvv1
method.comment: Return Map as Object Key is ID , Value is Object (Marker,MapPolygon,MapPolyline) ObjectMap = OpenMap.LoadMKL(Path, FileName)

method.name: _vvvvvvvv2
method.comment: Removes the specified circle from the map.

method.name: _vvvvvvvv4
method.comment: Removes the specified marker from the map.

method.name: _vvvvvvvv5
method.comment: Removes the specified polygon from the map.

method.name: _vvvvvvvv6
method.comment: Removes the specified polyline from the map.

method.comment: get or set the zoom level.
